  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(String cinemaName, CinemaType cinemaType, ArrayList<ArrayList<Seat>> seatTemplate)
      Constructor for creating a cinema
      Parameters:
      cinemaName - Name of the cinema
      cinemaType - Type of the cinema
      seatTemplate - 2D array of seats that act as the template to be copied for each screening

  • Method Details

    • getMovieList

      public List<Movie> getMovieList()
      Returns:
      List of movies currently showing in the cinema

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List of screenings containing the movie

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Seat>> getSeatTemplate()

      Returns:
      2D ArrayList of seats

    • getScreeningList

      public ArrayList<Screening> getScreeningList()
      Returns:
      List of current screenings

    • addToScreeningList

      public void addToScreeningList(Screening screening)
      Adds a new screening into the current screening list, and copies the seat template
      Parameters:
      screening - screening to add to the cinema

    • removeScreeningList

      public boolean removeScreeningList(Screening screening)
      Remove a Screening from the ScreeningList
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      success or failure
